query.queryString: INSERT INTO food (foodname, foodphoto, price, cnt ) VALUES ( '버터빵', '../image/f2png', 5700,5)

DELETE FROM food WHERE (num = 4) AND (foodname = '버터빵') AND (foodphoto = '../image/f2png') AND (price = 5700) AND (cnt = 5)
DELETE FROM food WHERE (num = 5) AND (foodname = '소금빵') AND (foodphoto = '../image/f3png') AND (price = 5600) AND (cnt = 6)

create table jshop(num int auto_increment primary key, sangpum varchar(20), color varchar(20), price int, imagename varchar(50))
